definition: to lead a group/leader of a group/captain (of sports squad)
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: The role of lead car has been rotated which is great and a bit of fun.
sentences.chinese: 領隊的車已被旋轉的作用是一個偉大的一點樂趣。

sentences.english: City manager Joe Royle could barely contain his anger at the official's performance.
sentences.chinese: 曼城領隊萊爾對球證表現感到怒不可遏。

sentences.english: Excuse me, are you Mr. Hansen, the manager of the Australian volleyball team?
sentences.chinese: 請問，您是澳大利亞排球隊領隊漢森先生嗎？

sentences.english: Your tour leader will invite you for a small trip on your bike in and around Mechelen.
sentences.chinese: 您的領隊將邀請您的一小行的自行車和周圍邁克倫。

sentences.english: He was the first white bandleader to adopt and popularize a jazz style.
sentences.chinese: 他是第一個創建和普及一種爵士風格的白人樂隊領隊。

sentences.english: He doubled as captain and coach of the team.
sentences.chinese: 他在這個隊裏當領隊兼教練。

sentences.english: Red Leader's X-wing had a Red R5 unit assigned to it.
sentences.chinese: 紅色領隊的X翼被分到一個紅色R5機器人。

sentences.english: Tour leaders can now enter the visa hall with tour groups from their agency for the visa interview.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊團領隊現在可以進入簽證處協助其團員進行面籤。

sentences.english: Your tour leader will guide you to the town centre of Antwerpen.
sentences.chinese: 您的領隊將引導您到市中心的安特衛普。

sentences.english: Chinese Taipei Golf Assocation is planning to invites all visiting officials and Team Captains to play golf on Sep 30th.
sentences.chinese: 中華臺北高協將邀請所有領隊及隊職員參加球敘。

sentences.english: When my son was in second grade I was the leader of his Cub Scout Den.
sentences.chinese: 我兒子二年級的時候我成了他們幼年童子軍的領隊人。

sentences.english: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger wants Holland international Dennis Bergkamp to sign a new two-year contract by Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 阿仙奴領隊雲格希望荷蘭國腳柏金在聖誕前續約兩年。

sentences.english: He was going to be our team leader.
sentences.chinese: 他原打算當我們的領隊。

sentences.english: Campers should not be related to the chaperon or liaison officer.
sentences.chinese: 營員與領隊老師或聯絡官員無親屬關係。

sentences.english: But when he pulled, he could not budge him!
sentences.chinese: 但是領隊拉着繩走時，卻牽不動小黑子。

sentences.english: I drew a cartoon of a cheerleader on my paper.
sentences.chinese: 我在紙上畫了一幅拉拉隊領隊的漫畫。

definition: member of same class, team, work group etc/teammate
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
